vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
θερ-ισμός, ὁ,
mowing, reaping, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II reaping-time, harvest, [NT+5th c.BC+]
__II.2 harvest, crop, [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: a harvest, the act of gathering in the harvest, reaping, Jn. 4:35; metaphorically the harvest of the Gospel, Mt. 9:37, 38; Lk. 10:2; a crop; metaphorically the crop of vengeance, Rev. 14:15
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 收割 (過程)
2) 收成
2a)要贏取的靈魂
2b)要來的審判 (啟 14:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 收割 (过程)
2) 收成
2a)要赢取的灵魂
2b)要来的审判 (启 14:15)
